string.value: You've received the Bing Machine-Alpha. But #b#p9250125##k seems to have something he wants to say...
You've received the Bing Machine-Alpha. But #b#p9250125##k seems to have something he wants to say...

Like the suit? From now on, you must wear it and fight the aliens!
#L0##bYes! Fight the aliens!#l
#L1#Isn't there a way to avoid needless bloodshed?#l
#k
Let me reiterate that point. You MUST wear the Bing Machine-Alpha to fight aliens. You can't hurt them if you're not wearing it. Got it?\r\n#L0##bGot it! For Maple World!#l\n#k
Your enthusiasm is charming. But yes, you can do it!
If you can think of a way, be my guest...
Great! From now on, get missions from #b#p9250133##k in the OSSS Laboratory.
OSSS has promised to reward you for your efforts. Make sure to go through #b#p9250133##k for your missions so that you receive official recognition.
Wouldn't it be a shame to lose our beautiful world to aliens?
I see that you've received an operational suit. To support your efforts, the OSSS will issue you medals.
To find out how to use the medals, talk to #b#p9250135##k.
From now on, you'll have to complete the missions assigned to you by the OSSS. Are you ready?
Feel free to talk to me when you feel that you're ready.
Find #b#p9250133##k in the laboratory left of my room.
